overview: Hello Jadoo, a famous fairy tale! Hyo-nyeo Plum and Princess Thumb. A filial piety, not Simcheong, has arrived! Jadu lives alone with her father, who has poor eyesight. I'm on a boat to get the Indangsu lotus, which is a special medicine... A small plum born from a flower as a Thumb Princess! Eagles, serpents, and all kinds of animals are trying to eat them, and even Prince Yunseok's blatant affectionate offensive of the ant kingdom! It's a hard life
title: Hello Plum, Mythical Fairy Tale : Hyo-nyeo Plum & Thumb Princess
